DESCRIPTION: A resource used by cards and buildings.
Spend the shown amount of Material from your hand NL (unless specified otherwise). NL If you don't have enough, the effect does not happen.
An orb that consumes 1 Material from your hand to fire at the end of your turn.
A building orb that produces Material.
A trap orb that explodes when evoked.
Makes turrets deal their end of round damage without spending Material.
Refers to cards in Hand, Draw Pile and Discard Pile. NL In this order.
